name: TruChristian
0:
”Alexa, open true christian radio”
”Alexa, start true christian radio”
”Alexa, play true christian radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true christian radio
des: Welcome to TruChristian, the beacon of hope and harmony that brings the word of God into your daily life. Our station is dedicated to spreading love, peace, and the teachings of Christ through music. TruChristian is more than just a radio station; it’s a family united in faith and love. Join us on this divine journey, 24/7, as we celebrate the glory of God together.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
